description:
The Heidenheim was the flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch215 [Erlache]. It was destroyed by a battleship of the Alliance 2nd Fleet, after Erlache disobeyed High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch186 [Lohengramm]`s orders by attempting to reverse course to face the enemy.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Heidenheim
